/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. On either side of the road, trees and buildings rise up, their details softened by the distance. The road itself is lined with lampposts, standing like sentinels along the way. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
